description: German club Ripdorf stepped onto the pitch, kicked the ball away and then stood on the sidelines.
title: Coronavirus: Football team loses 37-0 in socially distanced match
title_page: Coronavirus: Football team loses 37-0 in socially distanced match - BBC News
maintext: Ripdorf said they did not feel safe as at the time of the game 14 days had not yet passed since Holdenstedt players had come into contact with the person who tested positive.
